Query: Convert mkv to mp4 with ffmpeg

Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Remux MKV video to MP4 without re-encoding audio or video streams
Top-3 Similar Questions: so_59256447: Converting mkv to mp4 with ffmpeg sometimes loses video
ul_114908: Bash script to convert all *flac to *.mp3 with FFmpeg?
au_707397: Batch convert H.265 mkv to H.264 with ffmpeg to make files compatible for re-encoding
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_114908: for i in *.flac ; do 
    ffmpeg -i "$i" -acodec libmp3lame "$(basename "${i/.flac}")".mp3
    sleep 60
done

au_707397: INPUT="$1"
for i in *.mkv ; do
    ffmpeg -i "$i" -bsf:v h264_mp4toannexb -sn -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vcodec libx264 "$i.ts"
    mv "$i.ts" "$i.mpg"
    sleep 3
done

ffmpeg -i "$i"

Explanations about Options.-acodec: Set the audio codec. This is an alias for "-codec:a".
